file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-25-01-04 - PSU SWITCH ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PSU SWITCH ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the PSU switch assembly. B. The PSU switch assembly are located in the PSU installation. C. Attention must be given to safety precautions presented below, when working on the PSU switch assembly. • Disconnect electrical power. • Always use insulated tools when working on or near electrical circuits. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 33-25-01-000-801-A PSU SWITCH ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL PSU SWITCH ASSEMBLY - INSTALLA- ALL 33-25-01-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-25-01 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-25-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PSU SWITCH ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This section gives the procedures for the removal of the PSU switch assembly. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Performs the Task Passenger Cabin H. Removal of the PSU Switch Assembly (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the switch panel (1) from the mounting plate (2). (2) Remove the double sided adhesive backing from the switch (1) and the mounting plate (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-25-01 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL PSU Switch Assembly Figure 401 2. MOUNTING PLATE 1. SWITCH PANEL EM145AMM331022A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-25-01 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-25-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. PSU SWITCH ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This section gives the procedures for the installation of the PSU switch assembly. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Performs the Task Passenger Cabin H. Installation of the PSU Switch Assembly (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Apply the double sided adhesive backing to the switch (1) or the mounting plate (2). (2) Install the switch (1) on the mounting plate (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-25-01 Page 4 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
